title.rendered: Great Deals This Week & News – July 17

content.rendered:
Looking for a Great Deal on New Releases?

Here’s How…

American publishing houses typically release a book in hardback then wait six months to a year before printing it in paperback. Even if you can’t wait for the paperback version, you can save big bucks by shopping our New Release shelves. You can score great new books, often for less than half the publisher’s release price!

If you simply must have that brand new book right away, we are happy to order it for you with great discounts. Remember, you’ll receive the most Gottwals store credit if you trade it before the paperback becomes available.

Visit our Facebook page and tell us which books you are waiting for in anxious anticipation!

Be a Superhero for Schools!

Many teachers shop at Gottwals for the best value on books to stock their classroom libraries, fill class sets, or shop for curriculum aids and reference materials. You can support these efforts by sharing a portion of your Gottwals store credit with a local teacher (we are happy to split your credit onto multiple cards) or you can give a Gottwals Gift Certificate.

Teacher Discount

If you are a teacher yourself, present your teacher ID for a 10% discount on in-store purchases.

Learn about school book orders!

Thank you, Commissioner Bechtel!

Here is Bibb Commissioner Gary Bechtel reading to some of our youngest citizens. Our next Kids’ Corner will be at our Warner Robins store at 10:00 a.m. on Wednesday, July 23.

Gottwals Books in Warner Robins

Our Russell Parkway store was the first Gottwals Books and remains the largest in terms of inventory. Having tripled in size since opening in a single storefront back in 2007, this store has lots of towering aisles and tiny rooms full of treasures! Here you’ll find books in all of the genres we carry, including an extensive homeschool curriculum collection.

Toy of the Week

Kickball: $9.97

Summer isn’t over yet! Drop by your local Gottwals to pick up some bouncing, fanciful fun for the beach and backyard. Choose a pretty pink Bella Butterfly, bright Bollie Ladybug, blue Scootin’ Turtle, or grinning green Froggy kickball!
